lead_paragraph: Four-time Fed Cup champion Russia was on the brink of a surprise first-round defeat to the Netherlands after going 2-0 down on the first day Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Bertens Gives Netherlands Lead Over Russia in Fed Cup
headline.main: Bertens Gives Netherlands Lead Over Russia in Fed Cup

snippet: Four-time Fed Cup champion Russia was on the brink of a surprise first-round defeat to the Netherlands after going 2-0 down on the first day Saturday....
